name: QuestionTrueorFalse
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: question true or false
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill subjects you to simple quizzes that you will have to answer simply or with true or false!

To find out at any time what your score is, you can say: Alexa, What is my score?

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/smartskills.it
